cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size feature
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Rev': 'Rev', 'Dr': 'Dr', 'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Mrs', 'Mme': 'Mrs',
        'Don': 'Rare', 'Sir': 'Rare', 'Lady': 'Rare', 'Col': 'Rare',
        'Capt': 'Rare', 'Major': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Group rare titles
title_rare = ['Rare', 'Unknown']
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')

# 5. Encode titles
title_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.transfo

test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size feature
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Rev': 'Rev', 'Dr': 'Dr', 'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Mrs', 'Mme': 'Mrs',
        'Don': 'Rare', 'Sir': 'Rare', 'Lady': 'Rare', 'Col': 'Rare',
        'Capt': 'Rare', 'Major': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Group rare titles
title_rare = ['Rare', 'Unknown']
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')

# 5. Encode titles
title_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.transfo

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size feature
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Rev': 'Rev', 'Dr': 'Dr', 'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Mrs', 'Mme': 'Mrs',
        'Don': 'Rare', 'Sir': 'Rare', 'Lady': 'Rare', 'Col': 'Rare',
        'Capt': 'Rare', 'Major': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Group rare titles
title_rare = ['Rare', 'Unknown']
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: x if x not in title_rare else 'Rare')

# 5. Encode titles
title_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title_Encoded'] = title_encoder.transfo
